meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one million cycles per second.
meanings.sent1: The radio station broadcasts at one million megacycles.
meanings.sent2: My computer processor operates at one million megacycles per second.
meanings.sent3: I tried to count the megacycles in the blinking lights, but they were too fast!
meanings.sent4: The city pulsed with energy, each building vibrating at a million megacycles.
meanings.sent5: The hummingbird's wings beat at a speed of one million megacycles, a blur of motion.

meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one million hertz.
meanings.sent1: The signal was transmitted at one million megacycles per second.
meanings.sent2: The sound wave had a frequency of one million megacycles.
meanings.sent3: The cat's purring reached a frequency of one million megacycles, almost like a tiny engine.
meanings.sent4: The music filled the room with vibrations, each note resonating at a million megacycles.
meanings.sent5: The earthquake shook the ground at a frequency of one million megacycles, causing ripples in the water.
